data.message: What happened to the "thankful" icon ... I liked it!  Sometimes a simple "thank you" is the right response.  Y'all should bring it back !!

replies.message: Hi Vincent! Happy to hear you liked the thankful Reaction. Although it was only available for Mother’s Day, we appreciate feedback from the Facebook community and use it to help inform our decisions. If there's anything else we can do to improve your Facebook experience, please let us know: http://bit.ly/2pUX3Cs. -Stephanie

I inadvertently changed my language selection (in "settings") from English to "I DON'T KNOW WHAT", since I don't speak, read/write or understand THAT language ... and I need to get it back to English. How do I do this ?
Hi Vincent. You can learn how to change the language you see on Facebook here: http://bit.ly/2qcyUYA. Thanks. -Jessica

Thanks, but that doesn't help.  I am currently using the OLD facebook format to send THIS message (glad I saved the old format).  If I go to the NEW facebook format, my account appears in this "foreign language", which I don't understand, so I CAN'T follow any instructions.
